src: žini-ɬ-do m-aq’e-č m-ac’-oɬ ħeleku, “bodu ħeleku Malakulmawt lo” ƛe gič’-en, hi͂č’e-ru oɬu-l, ʕali-ɬ-do “kiš” ƛe n-ac’əj nɨsə-n, ʕali-ɬ-do “kiš” ʕali-ɬ-do “kiš”
trs: \sqt{When she saw it coming, thinking that the cock was Malakulmawt, she said, frightened, "Shoo!" to Ali.}

imt: then	cock(\textsc{iv})	back	\textsc{iv}-turn-\textsc{fut.neg-int}
trs: \sqt{Would not the cock then turn around?}

imt: then	back		\textsc{iv}-turn-\textsc{cvb}	Ali-\textsc{cont-dir}	come-\textsc{cvb}	be.\textsc{prs.iv}
trs: \sqt{Then having turned, it went to Ali.}

imt: Ali-\textsc{cont-dir} come-\textsc{ant.cvb}  Ayshat-\textsc{obl-cont-dir} \textsc{interj} Ayshat-\textsc{obl-cont-dir} \textsc{interj} \textsc{quot} say-\textsc{cvb} Ali-\textsc{erg=add} \textsc{iv}-chase-\textsc{cvb} be.\textsc{prs.iv} that
src: \textbf{ʕali-ɬ-do} \textbf{nuw-oɬ}, “ʕajšat-i-ɬ-do kiš, ʕajšat-i-ɬ-do kiš” ƛe nɨsə-n ʕali-lo-n b-oc’-on lo ogu
trs: \sqt{When it came to Ali, Ali chased it away, saying "Shoo!" to Ayshat.}

imt: back \textsc{iv}-go-\textsc{cvb} back \textsc{iv}-go-\textsc{cvb} courtyard-\textsc{in-trans} window-\textsc{obl-in-trans} look.\textsc{pl-cvb} boy=\textsc{add} neighbours=\textsc{add} be.\textsc{cvb} be.\textsc{prs.hpl}
src: deno m-eƛ’e-n  beddo m-eƛ’e-n maha-a-ƛ’ žoʁ-i-i-ƛ’ tuwαc’ə-n ože=n maduhanɬi=n zuq’un lo
trs: \sqt{While it went back and forth, the boy and the neighbours were looking at them from the courtyard through the window.}

imt: person-\textsc{pl} be.\textsc{cvb} be.\textsc{prs.hpl} laugh.\textsc{pl-icvb} that-\textsc{pl-spr}
trs: \sqt{The people were laughing at them.}

imt: so-\textsc{gen} think(\textsc{v}) \textsc{v}-happen-\textsc{cvb} be.\textsc{prs.v}
trs: \sqt{Such a thing happened.}
